net.bican.wordpress

Class Wordpress

  • java.lang.Object
    • net.bican.wordpress.Wordpress

  • public class Wordpress
extends Object
    The utility class that links xmlrpc calls to Java functions.
    Author:
    Can Bican

      • Wordpress

        public Wordpress(String username,
                 String password,
                 String xmlRpcUrl)
          throws MalformedURLException
        Parameters:
        username - User name
        password - Password
        xmlRpcUrl - xmlrpc communication point, usually blogurl/xmlrpc.php
        Throws:
        MalformedURLException - If the URL is faulty

    • Method Detail

      • deleteComment

        public boolean deleteComment(Integer commentID)
                      throws InsufficientRightsException,
                             ObjectNotFoundException,
                             redstone.xmlrpc.XmlRpcFault
        Parameters:
        commentID - comment id to delete
        Returns:
        result of the operation
        Throws:
        InsufficientRightsException - if the user does not have the moderate_comments cap or if the user does not have permission to edit this comment
        ObjectNotFoundException - if no comment with that comment_id exists
        redstone.xmlrpc.XmlRpcFault - if there is a generic error during request

      • deletePost

        public boolean deletePost(Integer postId)
                   throws InsufficientRightsException,
                          ObjectNotFoundException,
                          redstone.xmlrpc.XmlRpcFault
        Parameters:
        postId - post id to delete
        Returns:
        true
        Throws:
        InsufficientRightsException - if the user does not have permission to delete the post
        ObjectNotFoundException - if no post with that post_id exists
        redstone.xmlrpc.XmlRpcFault - if there is a generic error during request

      • deleteTerm

        public boolean deleteTerm(String taxonomy,
                          Integer termId)
                   throws InsufficientRightsException,
                          redstone.xmlrpc.XmlRpcFault
        Parameters:
        taxonomy - taxonomy name
        termId - term id
        Returns:
        the result of the operation
        Throws:
        InsufficientRightsException - if the user does not have the assign_terms cap for this taxonomy
        redstone.xmlrpc.XmlRpcFault - if there is a generic error during request

      • editComment

        public boolean editComment(Comment comment)
                    throws InvalidArgumentsException,
                           InsufficientRightsException,
                           ObjectNotFoundException,
                           redstone.xmlrpc.XmlRpcFault
        Parameters:
        comment - edited form of the comment object
        Returns:
        Result of the operation
        Throws:
        InvalidArgumentsException - if status is not a valid comment status
        InsufficientRightsException - if the user does not have the moderate_comments cap or if the user does not have permission to edit this comment.
        ObjectNotFoundException - if no comment with that comment_id exists
        redstone.xmlrpc.XmlRpcFault - if there is a generic error during request

      • editPost

        public boolean editPost(Integer postId,
                        Post post)
                 throws InsufficientRightsException,
                        InvalidArgumentsException,
                        ObjectNotFoundException,
                        redstone.xmlrpc.XmlRpcFault
        Parameters:
        postId - post id to edit
        post - edited contents
        Returns:
        true
        Throws:
        InsufficientRightsException - one of the following reasons:
        • if the user does not have the edit_posts cap for this post type
        • if user does not have permission to create post of the specified post_status
        • if post_author is different than the user's ID and the user does not have the edit_others_posts cap for this post type
        • if sticky is passed and user does not have permission to make the post sticky, regardless if sticky is set to 0, 1, false or true
        • if a taxonomy in terms or terms_names is not supported by this post type
        • if terms or terms_names is set but user does not have assign_terms cap
        • if an ambiguous term name is used in terms_names
        InvalidArgumentsException - if invalid post_type is specified or if an invalid term ID is specified in terms
        ObjectNotFoundException - if no author with that post_author ID exists or if no attachment with that post_thumbnail ID exists
        redstone.xmlrpc.XmlRpcFault - if there is a generic error during request

      • editProfile

        public boolean editProfile(User user)
                    throws InsufficientRightsException,
                           redstone.xmlrpc.XmlRpcFault
        Parameters:
        user - contents of the edited fields
        Returns:
        the result of the operation
        Throws:
        InsufficientRightsException - if the user does not permission to edit his/her profile.
        redstone.xmlrpc.XmlRpcFault - if there is a generic error during request

      • editTerm

        public boolean editTerm(Integer termId,
                        Term content)
                 throws InsufficientRightsException,
                        InvalidArgumentsException,
                        ObjectNotFoundException,
                        redstone.xmlrpc.XmlRpcFault
        Parameters:
        termId - term id
        content - new contents
        Returns:
        the result of the operation
        Throws:
        InsufficientRightsException - if the user does not have the assign_terms cap for this taxonomy
        InvalidArgumentsException - if invalid taxonomy name is specified
        ObjectNotFoundException - if the term id is not found
        redstone.xmlrpc.XmlRpcFault - if there is a generic error during request

      • getComment

        public Comment getComment(Integer comment_id)
                   throws redstone.xmlrpc.XmlRpcFault,
                          InsufficientRightsException,
                          ObjectNotFoundException
        Parameters:
        comment_id - comment_id to fetch
        Returns:
        A Comment object
        Throws:
        InsufficientRightsException - if the user does not have the moderate_comments cap
        ObjectNotFoundException - if no comment with that comment_id exists
        redstone.xmlrpc.XmlRpcFault - if there is a generic error during request

      • getComments

        public List<Comment> getComments(String status,
                                 Integer post_id,
                                 Integer number,
                                 Integer offset)
                          throws InsufficientRightsException,
                                 redstone.xmlrpc.XmlRpcFault
        Parameters:
        status - One of "approve", "hold", or "spam". Or, null to show all.
        post_id - Filter comments by post_id, or null to not filter.
        number - The number of comments to return, or null for the default (of 10)
        offset - The offset into the set of comments to return, or null for 0
        Returns:
        A list of Comment objects
        Throws:
        InsufficientRightsException - if the user does not have the moderate_comments cap
        redstone.xmlrpc.XmlRpcFault - if there is a generic error during request

      • getCommentsCount

        public CommentCount getCommentsCount(Integer postId)
                              throws redstone.xmlrpc.XmlRpcFault,
                                     InsufficientRightsException
        Parameters:
        postId - Blog Post ID
        Returns:
        Number of comments (approved, spam, otherwise)
        Throws:
        redstone.xmlrpc.XmlRpcFault - if there is a generic error during request
        InsufficientRightsException - if the user does not have the edit_posts cap

      • newComment

        public Integer newComment(Integer post_id,
                          Integer comment_parent,
                          String content,
                          String author,
                          String author_url,
                          String author_email)
                   throws InsufficientRightsException,
                          ObjectNotFoundException,
                          redstone.xmlrpc.XmlRpcFault
        Parameters:
        post_id - Post to attach the comment to.
        comment_parent - Id of the parent comment (for threading)
        content - Content of comment
        author - Author's name
        author_url - Author's URL (can be empty)
        author_email - Author's Email Address
        Returns:
        the id for the newly created comment.
        Throws:
        InsufficientRightsException - if anonymous comments are disallowed and invalid credentials are supplied, or if comment does not follow required comment fields configuration.
        ObjectNotFoundException - if no post with that post_id exists
        redstone.xmlrpc.XmlRpcFault - if there is a generic error during request

      • newPost

        public Integer newPost(Post post)
                throws InsufficientRightsException,
                       InvalidArgumentsException,
                       ObjectNotFoundException,
                       redstone.xmlrpc.XmlRpcFault
        Parameters:
        post - new post contents
        Returns:
        the post id
        Throws:
        InsufficientRightsException - one of the following reasons:
        • if the user does not have the edit_posts cap for this post type
        • if user does not have permission to create post of the specified post_status
        • if post_author is different than the user's ID and the user does not have the edit_others_posts cap for this post type
        • if sticky is passed and user does not have permission to make the post sticky, regardless if sticky is set to 0, 1, false or true
        • if a taxonomy in terms or terms_names is not supported by this post type
        • if terms or terms_names is set but user does not have assign_terms cap
        • if an ambiguous term name is used in terms_names
        InvalidArgumentsException - if invalid post_type is specified or if an invalid term ID is specified in terms
        ObjectNotFoundException - if no author with that post_author ID exists or if no attachment with that post_thumbnail ID exists
        redstone.xmlrpc.XmlRpcFault - if there is a generic error during request

      • newTerm

        public Integer newTerm(Term term)
                throws InsufficientRightsException,
                       InvalidArgumentsException,
                       redstone.xmlrpc.XmlRpcFault
        Parameters:
        term - new term
        Returns:
        the term id
        Throws:
        InsufficientRightsException - if the user does not have the assign_terms cap for this taxonomy
        InvalidArgumentsException - if invalid taxonomy name is specified
        redstone.xmlrpc.XmlRpcFault - if there is a generic error during request

      • uploadFile

        public MediaItemUploadResult uploadFile(InputStream media,
                                        String fileName)
                                 throws InsufficientRightsException,
                                        FileUploadException,
                                        redstone.xmlrpc.XmlRpcFault,
                                        IOException
        Parameters:
        media - file data
        fileName - file name
        Returns:
        the result of the operation
        Throws:
        InsufficientRightsException - if the user does not have the upload_files cap
        FileUploadException - if the file cannot be uploaded
        redstone.xmlrpc.XmlRpcFault - if there is a generic error during request
        IOException - if there is an I/O problem processing the file data on a temporary file

      • uploadFile

        public MediaItemUploadResult uploadFile(InputStream media,
                                        String fileName,
                                        Boolean overwrite)
                                 throws InsufficientRightsException,
                                        FileUploadException,
                                        redstone.xmlrpc.XmlRpcFault,
                                        IOException
        Parameters:
        media - file data
        fileName - file name
        overwrite - to overwrite an existing file
        Returns:
        the result of the operation
        Throws:
        InsufficientRightsException - if the user does not have the upload_files cap
        FileUploadException - if the file cannot be uploaded
        redstone.xmlrpc.XmlRpcFault - if there is a generic error during request
        IOException - if there is an I/O problem processing the file data on a temporary file

      • uploadFile

        public MediaItemUploadResult uploadFile(InputStream media,
                                        String fileName,
                                        Boolean overwrite,
                                        Integer postId)
                                 throws InsufficientRightsException,
                                        FileUploadException,
                                        redstone.xmlrpc.XmlRpcFault,
                                        IOException
        Parameters:
        media - file data
        fileName - file name
        overwrite - to overwrite an existing file
        postId - post id
        Returns:
        the result of the operation
        Throws:
        InsufficientRightsException - if the user does not have the upload_files cap
        FileUploadException - if the file cannot be uploaded
        redstone.xmlrpc.XmlRpcFault - if there is a generic error during request
        IOException - if there is an I/O problem processing the file data on a temporary file
